context.definition: Total inbound new patient appointments from all sources (calls, referrals, online, attorneys)
context.business_impact: Primary driver of surgical pipeline and revenue growth. Critical for maintaining practice volume.
context.industry_benchmark: 250-300 new leads per month for multi-specialty spine practices

root_causes.cause: Intake call abandon rate increased to 22%

trend_analysis.key_insights: Consistent downward trajectory over past 3 months requires immediate attention

recommended_actions.action: Re-engage attorney referral partners with quarterly outreach program
Increase Google Ads budget by 30% targeting injury-specific keywords
Implement call center training to reduce abandon rate below 15%

context.definition: Referral-to-Appointment Conversion measures the performance of referral-to-appointment conversion in patient access operations
context.business_impact: Critical metric for referral-to-appointment conversion affecting overall patient flow and revenue
context.industry_benchmark: 85 % is the target benchmark for this KPI

root_causes.cause: Staff training gaps on new protocols

trend_analysis.key_insights: Referral-to-Appointment Conversion shows down trajectory requiring monitoring

recommended_actions.action: Enhance staff training on documentation protocols

trend_analysis.key_insights: Days to First Appointment shows down trajectory requiring monitoring
